/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky. Buildings of various heights and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. A car is captured mid-motion on the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
